pros: The clients - very varied and interesting work
cons: Short staffed and not enough support - time spent on admin rather than supporting clients

pros: There is nothing good about this company, they supposed to be a Health Care Company, with no regard for their staff or the place safety and working conditions
cons: Staff are treated terribly no respect, you can't ask question to hire management, they just tell you to go away and get on with it, can't even provide towels rolls, staff are told to us hand towels from dispenser, if anyone is upset because they maybe a new starter, there's no support, help or even a kind word. 11 people have either been finished with no notice /sacked or just walked of the premises, don't waste your time working for this company
